website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking hair rollers using molecular steam technology should give this popular product a try.
pros: Gentle steam infuses into the foam rollers for gentle styling on all hair types
cons: Hair needs to be dry before using

customer_reviews.title: They do not hold the curls for days like they used to. Find another company to make them
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I have used Caruso rollers since the 1980's aand have always liked them. Theses rollers are not the same the foam is not the same on the rollers and does not hold the curls like they used to. The foam feels very hard. I still have some of my rollers and can prove that they are not the same. Have bought new ones over the years and cannot use anything else so am very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gillian M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've used them for quite some time, and these are my second order. They do eventually need replacement. I have fine hair, and after drying my hair, I pop these in for maybe 20 minutes, and I have wavy/curly hair for the entire day. No joke. The trick is to make sure your hair is DRY. Using these with damp hair doesn't give the wave/curl/volume you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Riorita

customer_reviews.title: Easy use!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I used to use the these in the 90's & eventually lost them. I have nerve damage in my hands & these make it easier for me then a curling iron where I have to hold my arm up for a bit. Great curl!! I won't lose these!!! Oh they come with a great hard plastic bag to hold the rollers & steamer!
customer_reviews.author: Santos Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I was able to find these on Amazon. I LOVE these steam rollers. I have medium to long hair, past shoulders, and it's difficult to keep the curl with ordinary curling irons. The steam rollers really heat the hair through and through and the curls last for at least a day or until I shampoo. I like the large and jumbo size rollers because with longer hair, it helps evenly distribute the heat so all the heat isn't just on the part of the hair you curl first.
customer_reviews.author: J Pham

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept however
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these anymore because they don't stay in. The shield doesn't fit securely on the roller. When they're in my hair, 2-3 rollers inevitably fall out. I love the concept however.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairstylist, and just recently discovered these. I actually use them for myself, and absolutely love them. I have about just below the shoulder length hair, and use the large and medium rollers. They’re so easy to use, even if you normally struggle to style your own hair. They’re super quick to put in also.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Benson

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like the ones I used years ago. These leave my hair wet & frizzy. These require that salt not to be used. By the time they get hot they are also wet. Used only one time & had to use a flat iron to get the friz out. The older ones were much better. I would not purchase this brand anymore. Was just a waste if money. Very disappointed with the results of this product. I am a licensed hairdresser & so disappointed I can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce or Donald Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement roller!
customer_reviews.text: I have user this steam roller set long enough that I had to get new roller! These work as well as the original ones that came with the original set.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Love These !
customer_reviews.text: Love love love ...Just need to keep in a bit longer and I like to use a drying cap or hit them with a dryer for a few minutes..use a bit of setting lotion of some Type as well. And the curls stay the distance !
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: But these to supplement the kit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need these with you kit purchase if you have long hair.
customer_reviews.author: VIVA STEED

customer_reviews.title: They are so easy to use and fast.
customer_reviews.text: They are great for soft curls and not drying your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Fresh perm every day without the perm drama!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this roller system since it first came out Early 90’s!! Why would you want to put the direct heat on your hair when you have this. The style lasts all day and the volume remains unchanged! I’m 51 and my hair looks and feels like 21!
customer_reviews.author: Karry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the thickness makes for beautiful curl and amazing body in your hair
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Quick curls
customer_reviews.text: Once I did a couple of practice runs with these I got the hang of using them. They make the ends of my hair frizzy, not smooth. I like how quickly they set the hair, will use them on my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best hot curlers
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these steam rollers for years and years. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Senter

customer_reviews.title: replacement sponge available?
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Caruso hair setter and I have been recommend it to everyone who had asked me what I use. I just wish the company sells sponge, and not entire roller because plastic roller part is still in good condition. Only sponge gets deteriorated. I took sponge part out of the roller trying to find a possible substitute sponge which can be cut and replace to the roller from a major hardware store, but no success. I feel why still a perfect piece have to be thrown out creating more trash.
customer_reviews.author: ytj1

customer_reviews.title: Love them you will too
customer_reviews.text: Love that my hair feels so soft after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K. Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting curl
customer_reviews.text: I have super soft hair and this is the only way I can get those big curls and keep them. They last all day and depending on the weather they may still be presentable the next morning. It is taking me a little while to get the length of time to steam the roller and how tightly to wrap my hair, but it's getting better. I'm definitely getting faster at the whole process. I receive lots of compliments everytime I use these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Lyons J.

customer_reviews.title: Steams rollers are amazing!! I've been using the caruso steam roller ...
customer_reviews.text: Steams rollers are amazing!! I've been using the caruso steam roller system for 20 yrs..... no joke.... curl holds and it so much healthier for your hair that dry heat!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This system and these large rollers make pretty nice curls once you get the feel of using it/them. These large rollers work quite well, but would have given the actual product itself 5 stars except the small and petite rollers are a little troublesome heating up so I've had to push them down with a comb to get them hot enough to use. I would recommend this product/these rollers for people on the go with medium length hair such as my own.
customer_reviews.author: Carole B

customer_reviews.title: They are really easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is that I seem to need to leave them in longer if I want really curly curls. They are really easy to put up, and the snap on covers hold my hair very well. For my sister's shorter hair, she uses a clip to help. overall, they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Puck

customer_reviews.title: Steaming Again!
customer_reviews.text: My original Caruso Molecular Steam Roller Set is probably 20 years old. The foam rollers had deteriorated while the steamer itself was working fine. I haven't been able to find these in stores recently and was pleased to be able to order them from Amazon. Everything is working good as new again!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: The convenience
customer_reviews.text: The curl with the steam rollers stay curled until you wash you hair
customer_reviews.author: Bella Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to use but once you get the hang of it they were ok
customer_reviews.author: K Deluca

customer_reviews.title: Caruso Model #06749-03 Professional Molecular Steam Rollers With Shields, Large 6-pack
customer_reviews.text: I love the Caruso hair system to curl hair. I bought extra curlers because I have thick hair. I bought the Caruso system to replace my old because. my old curlers were all falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: smanyhoofs

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for short or medium length and thickness
customer_reviews.text: Not good for long or thick hair unless you have the time to sit under a dryer. The holders don't work very well. I had to secure with pins.
customer_reviews.author: marilady

customer_reviews.title: These curlers are not large. If you want large ...
customer_reviews.text: These curlers are not large. If you want large curlers, be sure to order the Jumbo size. Also, they cannot be returned, so I've lost my money.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Newman

customer_reviews.title: Best curlers out there!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only curlers that actually work on my thick hair. And I don't feel like its damaging my hair. Curl sets well and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Waves

customer_reviews.title: I love these rollers
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollers. I have very straight fine hair. These are the only rollers that keep my hair curly all day.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Nollan

customer_reviews.title: No good if the foam is missing
customer_reviews.text: Foam was missing from rollers, still have rollers without foam - wasn't able to use them
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: curls your hair and leave it soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast way to curly hair, its simple to use and it leaves your hair soft. This is my second one and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ggcarr1950

customer_reviews.title: BOUNCY, BOUNCY CURLS
customer_reviews.text: I love to have extra rollers for my steam setter. They work great on my fine fair.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy's Kreatations

customer_reviews.title: Average product.
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Took more time than my in styler but probably easier on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these rollers many times over the years. These were too high priced.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good size for longer hair.
customer_reviews.text: Love this roller system. The larger rollers work best with Shoulder length and longer hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Happy camper now
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new curlers. Still have my original Caruso from 26 years ago...Still working but if worn out the curlers..I'm a Happy camper now!
customer_reviews.author: K J Long

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really loves the product. I use it for party hair and found it very easy to use. I have long hair. It usually takes me 30-45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Shou

customer_reviews.title: more curlers are better for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I love my Caruso curling set. I am glad I got the extra curlers since I have really thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alizon Roth

customer_reviews.title: Caruso Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large and the jumbo rollers, unfortunately, these rollers were the same identical size. I wish they had been described better with their actual sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Conny Fachet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used these curlers for years and I can't live without them......
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love my Caruso Steam Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I have owned my Caruso Steam roller for years and finally had to replace the rollers. Curling my hair is quick and easy. .... believe me, you don't want to leave the curlers in for any length of time or your hair will be way too curly....I would recommend the set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Large Steam Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My hair is color processed so these steam rollers add moisture, hold curl, and don't dry my hair out like the curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: jjann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: have been using Caruso curls for 20 years. I miss the ones that used salt... they made the best curl.
customer_reviews.author: sassy m

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: These can not be a genuine product. The sponge does not extend for the entire length of the roller and it is thinner than the original roller sponge, the caps are not interchangeable with my original Caruso rollers, they look good but do not function the same.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Caruso Hair Curlers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered wrong size, and sent them back. If I needed this size it would have been perfect.Love the color. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Rollers Ever
customer_reviews.text: Caruso curlers are the only rollers that will actually curl my hair! Glad I was able to find replacements and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these refills
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these refills for my Caruso machine. Glad these curler refills were available. Very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: I had owned one before, but the heating element went out. So happy to find one on Amazon.com! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Binstock

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for additional curlers for my steamer. These are a great value and were received promptly. I needed to replace the set I had from 10 years ago. These are my go to size. My hair is long (mid-back), fine, straight, and layered. These steam curlers do NOT damage your hair and maybe even improve the texture.
customer_reviews.author: NH Juice

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and these rollers
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and these rollers. I have used them for years and makes hair fixing fast and easy. Curl stays in better than with the curling iron and much more gentle on the hair. Everyone needs this product so you can use these steam curlers.......you need to buy the unit these curlers fix on and the curlers come in several sizes...easy to travel with, also. Check out Caruso Steam Unit on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... un-popping off -- this batch must have been a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: Ends keep un-popping off -- this batch must have been a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: dcbelle8

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got new curlers because last ones were always falling apart...the new ones do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: patricia seaver

customer_reviews.title: Want more!
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I bought these to add to the curlers I already have. Now, I want to buy more to replace my old curlers. Great product, delivered quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: ... most fantsatic roller for long hair and quick and easy to do when u in a hurry gives the ...
customer_reviews.text: the most fantsatic roller for long hair and quick and easy to do when u in a hurry gives the most beautiful curl which last all day
customer_reviews.author: jolanda ingham

customer_reviews.title: Size misleading
customer_reviews.text: Love this type of hair setter but so very disappointed on my recent purchase of 12 new rollers-last year I had purchased the jumbo and they turned out to be to large so I ordered the large(you see them here as two separate options) they are exactly the same! Large is jumbo! So now I'm stuck with 24 that are to big! Unfortunately I threw away packaging not using them right away and realizing there is large/jumbo only and not two separate sizes-very disappointed how this was listed!
customer_reviews.author: texasrose

customer_reviews.title: love Caruso!
customer_reviews.text: I have exclusively used Caruso Professional Molecular Steam Rollers for over 15 years and will continue as long as I can find replacements!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: Best hair care product ever. I use this product everyday. Don't know what I would do with out the Caruso Steam Rollers. Keeps my hair from drying out and keeps it looking shiny and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!  Have used for years!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these rollers/steamer for many years .... absolutely LOVE the results!! Only takes 5 minutes and is so much healthier for your hair than a curling iron!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Heizer

customer_reviews.title: Large Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I like the Caruso Steam Rollers. However, the roller is made of sponge and my hair rolls too tight with it? I would like to have a "Large" curl but, it seems that it comes out too curly for what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Caruso Steam Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Caruso products are much gentler on the hair since they use steam (rather than direct heat) to curl hair. I have used them for years and appreciate the fact that my hair remains undamaged from nearly daily use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luther

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These wear our over time and i was thrilled to find the original type onsale. they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it just what I was looking for !!;)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Soft Curls
customer_reviews.text: The Caruso Molecular Steam Rollers are the best that I have ever had for a soft curl that stays in.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Means

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to complete the travel set I previously ordered
customer_reviews.text: These rollers actually tame my frizz while being easy to use. They are also very easy to get out of your hair.
customer_reviews.author: leslie larsen

customer_reviews.title: Caruso Model #06749-03 Professional molecular steam rollers with shields
customer_reviews.text: I have an old molecular set, and really just needed the rollers, and I'm very happy with it, and would order again
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would never find replacement rollers for my Caruso steamer. This was a great and came in on time.
customer_reviews.author: monicabrne

customer_reviews.title: very good, was lost for a while
customer_reviews.text: very good , was lost for a while, but they reshippede
customer_reviews.author: Aage S Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The curlers were larger than I expected. I was not able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jester

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these rollers! Best curlers there is! We have used them for atleast 10 years. My girls used them in high school and still using them today. Just used them for my youngest wedding. She was beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: nan.

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: just as I had ordered and did not have to replace whole steamer
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: I should have waited to get the extra rollers
customer_reviews.text: These rollers do not say in my hair AT ALL. Clips simply do not work. The complete set I ordered didn't have enough of the right size for me, so I ordered these at the same time. Should have waited. Waste of money for me. (I have thick, healthy, slippery shoulder-length, layered hair. Use about a dozen 1.5" rollers.)
customer_reviews.author: J-L-V

customer_reviews.title: These "large" are really the Jumbo size
customer_reviews.text: According to the Caruso set I bought, the Jumbos are the same as these: the foam is about 1.5" in diameter. I wanted what they call the Large which is about 1 1/8" in diameter. I tried to return these but the seller (not Amazon) required me to pay the shipping which was nearly as much as the product, so I'm stuck with them and had to order "mediums." I suggest you check before ordering on the actual dimensions of the rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Large size. The only thing I'm not too happy about is that the foams themselves are a little bit short by a few millimeters. They don't cover the whole length of the roller unlike the older ones I have at home. Quality control issue? This is the first time I've seen this since I've owned two sets of Caruso steamer and replaced the steam rollers a number of times in the last 18 years.
customer_reviews.author: KALEKA0405

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love that it's steam and not heat - ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love that it's steam and not heat - better for my hair. The size of the rollers are a little "odd". Small ones are really small, then there is a medium one that is also kind of small. Then they jump up to a larger size. Seems like there should be an "in-between" size. Otherwise love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Galles

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work well on my hair type
customer_reviews.text: my hair goes flat rather quickly so doesn't hold all day. I have straight fine hair & it's always been hard to hold a curl. The covers don't stay on for me either since I have fine hair... The few times I took the time to use these my hair did look great for about an hour, but fell flat shortly after so not worth all the time it took to put it up.
customer_reviews.author: Prescottmom

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to see this offered. Rollers also work with Vidal Sasoon ionic steamers. My hair thanks you
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Replacement curlers
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, a little worn on one of the curlers, but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: This roller was not described well. It would have been helpful to have known just how large it was. There is a "large" and an "extra large" and I've ordered both. They appear to be the same size and both were disappointing. I don't know how to ascertain the correct size and have wasted money on these products for this reason. Sorry Caruso. I've used the "old" steamer for 25 years and your new and "improved" steamer is most inferior. Revert to the pink larger version, please! The plastic roller shell will not fit over the steam spout prior to closing over one's hair.
customer_reviews.author: mstnred

customer_reviews.title: I had to use clips to keep the rollers set ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to use clips to keep the rollers set because the outside of the part that is suppose to hold the roller in place, sometimes did not clip.
customer_reviews.author: calhuerra

customer_reviews.title: The product is excellent; the machine and steam rolling is sooo good ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent; the machine and steam rolling is sooo good for my hair...It's just getting the size roller right that can be problematic. I suggest that instead of calling their sizes small, med., large, etc. call them according to coin sizes: dime, nickel, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Flossie

customer_reviews.title: Different Size
customer_reviews.text: I use different sized on my fine / thin hair. I feel beautiful when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Deb

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I recently had extensions put in and I worried about overheating the bonds. I saw these and thought I would give them a try. My hair is to my waist and I worried about the time it would take with having to heat one roller at a time. I was done in fifteen minutes! My hair was gorgeous!!! I love the long curls and how shiny it is. Best part is no damage to the bonds. I would recommend these to everyone!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this except you can only heat up one curler ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this except you can only heat up one curler at a time and it's easy to get burned from the steam building up inside if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not the seller's fault, seller sent item in timely ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the seller's fault, seller sent item in timely fashion. It appears that Caruso is making these in a different way. The foam no longer fits entirely across to the ends of the plastic roller so any hair that doesn't stay in the middle where the foam is gets onto the plastic and doesn't curl correctly
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and easy to use. I have super straight hair and it was gorgeous after using them. Unfortunately the curls didn't stay as long as I hoped but I have yet to find something that does. It seems much less damaging than all the products that use high heat to set the curls.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. There was a slight learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. There was a slight learning curve. I love that I don't burn my fingers or scalp yet the results are fabulous curls.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannag

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful for relaxing my thick
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for relaxing my thick, beachy curls into big, rolling, elegant waves. They are quick and easy to use, which is great for a low maintenance (read lazy) girl like me. The only issue I have is that they tend to unroll if not clipped in just so, which frustrates me to no end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for my fairly short hair. I love my Caruso Steam device - have used it for many years
customer_reviews.author: Cary Lafaye

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: So fast, so simple,a pleasure to use. Have used curlers since I was a kid with the electric set. This is terrific. I mainly use it when I haven't washed my hair so it doesn't look as flat. If you use them after washing your hair, make sure it's completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: LBI

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: My Caruso steam roller set came with a variety of sizes, some of which I don't use on my long hair. I just needed a few more in this large size, and was pleased to discover that Amazon carries the individual sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ryan-loeb

customer_reviews.title: Caruso hair rollers
customer_reviews.text: The rollers were just like the original ones when I ordered this system over 15 years ago! They work very well. The only comment is that be careful that excess water does not drip out and get on your skin. They produce a lovely curl. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Steam Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I like Caruso steamer but I have to say the actual steam itself has changed over the years. The curls don't stay in like they used to unless you use a product on your hair. I personally don't like using products like hair spray or volumizer on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers to rollers were too loose.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Caruso for 10+ years but was a little disappointed with this purchase. Some of the covers to the rollers were too loose so I couldn't use them. I never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: These curlers are very durable and easy to use. I definitely recommend this product, but I do think that these are a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Haylex Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has extremely course and curly hair. She was wanting curlers and I had owned and still have Caruso curlers. I ordered her a set with extra curlers (extremely long hair). She loves them and uses them all the time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B. Mursuli

customer_reviews.title: As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these since I needed more rollers. My daughters and I have uber thick hair and what came with the Caruso is not enough to use in our hair. :) They work as expected and are perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair feel soft with full volume curl that doesn't damage
customer_reviews.text: These large size steam rollers do a great job putting a soft wave/curl in my long hair without damaging my ends like using a heat iron. I can really tell the difference with my hair! The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because the curl barely lasts to the end of the day, not "lasts for days" like it advertises. I use a styling creme and a glossing serum in my wet hair before blow drying. I usually use the rollers the following day and follow up with a quality hairspray and it still doesn't stay.
customer_reviews.author: KindleFan65

customer_reviews.title: Same great product through the years
customer_reviews.text: I have had my steamer for years but was in need of some new curlers. Same great curlers that had lasted me for years. Would buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

product_meta.title: Caruso Professional Large Molecular Replacement Steam Hair Rollers with Shields, 6-Pack, 1-1/2" Inches
product_meta.description: Size:LargeCaruso Professional is a brand that knows the potential of a great curl and the power of a full head of gorgeous curls. From the Molecular Steam Setters to the unique rollers and shields you have everything needed to create radiantly luxurious styles. ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Bolster your beauty collection with first-class styling appliances, Caruso Professional Molecular Steam Rollers with Shields. A quick heat-up and the unique design creates even moisture penetration, allows for breathing space between the foam roller and shield, and quick evaporation. Designed to allow use of a hair dryer or hood dryer for a faster styling and setting time. The unique shield lock holds rollers tightly in place helping the perfect curls form. The Large, 1 ½” size and convenient pack of 6 rollers and shields, make these rollers perfect for all hair types. Whether you need replacements or additional rollers the convenient 6-pack of rollers and shields is accommodating in creating gorgeous hairstyles.
feature_bullets: 6 LARGE Replacement or Additonal Rollers for Caruso Steam Setters
Unique design to promote quick evaporation, a faster styling and setting time
Includes Roller Shields with unique lock to hold roller tightly in place

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
